description: Airport revenue bonds for projects authorized in Part II and listed in Part IV.  Funding to yield appropriated amounts plus additional amounts for interest during construction, reserves, and issuance expenses.
fund_type: Airport Revenue Bond Funds, General Obligation Bond Funds
notes: Amount not specified.  Debt service paid from special funds.  Principal and interest payable from airport revenues, aviation fuel taxes, and passenger facility charges.

program: Airport Capital Improvement Program (Consolidated Rental Car Facilities)
description: Rental motor vehicle customer facility revenue bonds for projects authorized in Part II and listed in Part IV. Funding to yield appropriated amounts plus additional amounts for interest during construction, reserves, and issuance expenses.
fund_type: Rental Motor Vehicle Customer Facility Revenue Bond Funds
notes: Amount not specified. Debt service paid from rental motor vehicle customer facility charge special funds. Principal and interest payable from rental motor vehicle surcharge tax and special fund.

description: Harbor revenue bonds for projects authorized in Part II and listed in Part IV. Funding to yield appropriated amounts plus additional amounts for interest during construction, reserves, and issuance expenses.
fund_type: Harbor Revenue Bond Funds, General Obligation Bond Funds
notes: Amount not specified. Debt service paid from special funds. Principal and interest payable from harbor revenues.
